attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment all ePetitions just get an explanation of why the status quo is OK. 

What is required is action and change otherwise what is the point of this service. If this is not the purpose of the web site this should be made clear and upfront.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
